person.name: Jaana
person.topic: True justice satisfies all, false none.
Let justice be thy calling not thy excuse!Art thou just?Many a grave has been unjustly filled in the name of justice.Alas.

person.name: a guard
person.topic: A good life is inspired by love and guided by knowledge.

That'll be the right hand cell. careful in there!

person.topic: I invented quickness!Can thou cast it?It requires but one bloodmoss!Adept.

person.name: Talfourd
person.topic: It is hidden well!Can thou honestly claim to be guilty of no crime ever?Doubtful.Then do thy penance in a cell, and with the felon search ye well.

person.name: Flamis
person.topic: I hold the fabric of the true nature of justice.
The virtue of justice draws its nature from the principles of truth and love!
Of justice.Hast thou always been just?Unlikely.At least thou art honest.

person.name: Dwp
person.topic: Welcome thee to Yew city of justice!
Love no one more than the truth, for justice seeks no favors. Temper thy justice with understanding.
Yes 'tis a fair city!Dost thou like it?Let it be as thine!A pity.

person.name: a poor beggar.

person.topic: I eat people who bug me!

person.name: Pinrod
person.topic: On justice.Fight ye for justice?Good, the druids chant the mantra!Cad.

person.topic: The shrine is to the east then north!Dost thou have the rune?Now learn the mantra, and seek the green stone in 'Wrong'!Ask Talfourd for he knows of the rune.
